alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued March 04 at 3:05PM MST until March 05 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 7 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts up to 80 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Above 11000 Feet, Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Feet, Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000 Feet, and Wet Mountains Above 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 7 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains above 11000 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains above 10000 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
